internal.content: --- title: "Instana Integration" date: 2022-11-03T10:57:46+01:00 weight: 153 --- ## üöÄ TASK: Integrate Instana with CP4WAIOPS üåè Documentation for the Task: Creating Instana connections In this section you will connect CP4WAIOPS to the existing Instana instance using the following parameters: ```yaml Endpoint: Your Instana URL (probably something like https://dev-aiops..eu-gb.containers.appdomain.cloud/) API Token: The API Token from the previous step ``` ## Create the connection 1. In the `CP4WAIOPS` "Hamburger" Menu select `Define`/`Data and tool connections` 1. Click `Add connection` 1. Under `Instana`, click on `Add connection` 1. Click `Connect` 1. Name it `Instana` 1. Fill out the fields on the `Add Connection` page: ```yaml Endpoint: Your Instana URL (probably something like https://dev-aiops..eu-gb.containers.appdomain.cloud/) API Token: The API Token from the previous step ``` ![slack1](./../images/instana/instana_06.png) 1. Click `Next` 1. Leave the defaults on the `Topology Data` page: ![slack1](./../images/instana/instana_07.png) 1. Click `Next` 1. Fill out the fields on the `Event Data` page: ```yaml Incidents: Check Issues: Check Changes: Check (or Unchecked if you prefer not having too much Events coming in) ``` ![slack1](./../images/instana/instana_08.png) 1. Click `Next` 1. Fill out the fields on the `Metric Data` page: ```yaml Kubernetes Cluster: Check Kubernetes Deplyoment: Check Kubernetes Node: Check Kubernetes Pod: Check ``` ![slack1](./../images/instana/instana_09.png) 1. Click `Next` 1. Fill out the fields on the `Summary` page: ```yaml Only collect Live Data once Connection is established: Check ``` ![slack1](./../images/instana/instana_10.png) 1. Click `Done` 1. Make sure that the Data Collection turns green after a few minutes ![slack1](./../images/instana/instana_11.png) ![slack1](./../images/instana/instana_12.png) **Important - Data Collection takes some time** Data Collection can take 10-30 minutes. Events and Topology will eventually appear. You have successfully finished this Chapter. **You are now done with the chapter on Configuring Instana**
